scripts.stop: docker compose --profile dev --profile prod --profile debug down --remove-orphans
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.lint:backend: set -a && . ./.env && set +a && docker exec ${COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME}-backend ruff check /app/src --no-cache
scripts.lint:backend:fix: set -a && . ./.env && set +a && docker exec ${COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME}-backend ruff check /app/src --fix --no-cache
scripts.format:backend: set -a && . ./.env && set +a && docker exec ${COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME}-backend ruff format /app/src --no-cache
